fields.summary: Static subscriptions from network bridges do not respect TTL (off by one in calculation), resulting in duplicate consumers.

comments.body: Unit test that demonstrates bug by failing an assertion resulting from the duplicate/unexpected subscription propagation.
Patch that, once applied, allows AMQ4148Test to pass.
Does indeed appear to be an issue.  I tweaked the test a bit to ensure it doesn't fail because it didn't sleep long enough, and also ensure it doesn't hang on shutdown.
Nice investigation, applied the patch and an updated version of the test.
